title: Mercury Transit in the 11th House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: When Mercury transits the 11th house for Sagittarius Ascendant, thinking becomes future-oriented and goal-driven. Communication with friends, teams, and professional networks increases, helping articulate ambitions and strategies clearly. This phase favors networking, technology, and collaborative planning for gains. However, over-calculation or excessive messaging can strain group dynamics. When balanced, this transit supports idea monetization, strategic alliances, and practical steps toward long-term aspirations.
closing: This Mercury transit strengthens goal-oriented communication. With balance, it supports gains through networks, ideas, and clear long-term planning.
